page.title: 07RIVENDELL NURSERIES Ltd.
page.content: We went along to Rivendell Nurseries and interviewed the manager Mr. Christopher Wright . The Nursery started off small but grew quite rapidly and is now a large garden centre with many customers .It grows about 80% of their own plants and get the rest from nurseries abroad .The manager and his staff are trying to improve performance by using a computer to help them water the plants.This change will help business by saving time and trouble .The nursery is very popular,it sells many things ranging from garden fertilizers to Japanese ornaments.However, Rivendell is'nt the only nursery in the area ,Pilkingtons 1km to the north is much bigger and more popular so Rivendell has a bit of competition.
